TEMPLATE FEATURES

IT Agency - Web Design and Web Development Companies Joomla Template. Joomla! 3 Responsive Template, based on the Master Bootstrap Framework for Joomla! 3.x. The Bootstrap Framework makes it fully responsive to all screen resolutions and aspect ratios. The simplest way to build professional sites. Your imagination and your experience are the limit!

IT Agency Joomla! 3 Responsive Template Features:

  • Joomla! 3.x compatible.
  • Based on Bootstrap 3.3.5. One framework, every device. Bootstrap easily and efficiently scales your Joomla websites with a single code base, from phones to tablets to desktops with CSS media queries.
  • Responsive Mobile-Friendly template for all Joomla 3.x. A responsive layout automatically adapts to the viewing device, allowing for an optimized appearance on multiple devices, such as tablets.
  • Sticky pinned main menu, logo and widgets.
  • CSS Superfish multi-level dropdown pinned menu.
  • Responsive multi-level menu support, flexible and cross-browser compatibility.
  • Tableless design and 100% CSS based.
  • Built by advance HTML5 and CSS3.
  • Lightweight and fast-loading.
  • Logo as Image with configuration parameters.
  • Built-in Google Fonts (more fonts - 650+ available only with Qucikstart Package).
  • Built-in social media icons for the popular social networking sites including Twitter, Facebook, Google Plus, Youtube, LinkedIn and more...
  • 2 layout options: 2 columns (content + right), 1 column (content).
  • Typography Page.
  • A lot Module Positions. All module positions are fully collapsible.
  • Cross-Browser Support - Transport Joomla template work great with all modern browsers like Firefox, Chrome, Safari, Opera and Internet Explorer 9+.
  • Heading: h1, h2, h3, h4 and h5.
  • SEO SEF Optimised Layout. Optimized code for Search Engines which helps in SEO.
  • SEO Breadcrumbs with Microdata Google - this will give a nice category-display in the Google search results.
  • The template has a built-in fast "Back to top" button.
  • And more features, some only available in the Premium Version with quickstart package:

IT Agency Joomla Template Quickstart Instalation Package

What is quickstart package?

"Quickstart Package" is a IT Agency Joomla Template + Joomla 3 + all content, all modules, all components and settings used in demo site.

How to install Quickstart package?

Quickstart Package install exactly the same as a normal Joomla! installation package. (To get know more about technical requirements to run Joomla! please visit: Joomla technical requirements).

Quickstart will save your time and work. You will get exactly the same as demo page http://demo.joothemes.net/joomla3/itagency

Quickstart package extra features and modules:

  • Unite Revolution Slider - an awesome, fully responsive jQuery slider! (available only with Qucikstart Package - Save $29!)
  • Gallery plugin and module (available in Qucikstart Package). (Sigplus Image Gallery Plus is a straightforward way to add image or photo galleries to a Joomla article with a simple syntax. It takes a matter of minutes to set up a gallery but those who are looking for a powerful gallery solution will not be disappointed either: sigplus is suitable for both beginner and advanced users.
  • Built-in 650+ Google Fonts (available only with Qucikstart Package).
  • Joomla Custom Fields - IT Agency Portfolio category and additional Joomla fields. We used additional fields to build the Portfolio category! This is our first Joomla quickstart in which we use Joomla custom fields.
  • Extra Fields Gallery Plugin in Portfolio category. To the standard built-in additional fields in Joomla, we've added extra Fields Gallery Plugin. This plugin lets create new fields of type 'gallery' in the extensions where custom fields are implemented.
  • Joomla JUNewsUltra Pro news module display latest news (Joomla Articles) with full control over all elements, rich backend configs covering layout. auto thumbnail creating, images resizing, numbering articles, sorting etc. Best Joomla module for news, articles, YouTube and RSS with many options. Fast performs and mostly optimization for over 100.000 articles! Make you easy and simple templates! In one module, a greater functionality, which replaces a number of modules. Responsive and Retina image based in srcset browser support for responsive or mobile template! The module has the ability to create different patterns (templates), thus you can change the type of modules as you like and use the module on the news portals, on the portfolio or personal site. (JUNewsUltra Pro news module and our override template for Clients Testimonials view available only with Qucikstart Package).
  • JWeb Portfolio Display responsive grid module for Joomla that helps create a portfolio easily with filter, lightbox effect, page details and categories. There are lots of parameters and you can set them easily. This awesome module is responsive and seo optimized. Perfect solution for you to create your own portfolio on Joomla 3.x CMS.
  • Itcs TeamCards Module - show on with this module your team. Choose the colors and style in the back end and create up to 20 team cards in one module. The links can be individually adjusted per card, as well as the orientation of the image. The module and the animations come without javascript, since the effects are made of CSS3. 2 Language Files (EN, DE). Up to 20 Teamcards Responsive presentation. CSS3 animation. Without javascript. Icons changeable (ion-icons). Colors changeable. Automatic crop images.
  • Akeeba Backup Core - is the most widely used open-source backup component for the Joomla! CMS. Its mission is simple: create a site backup that can be restored on any Joomla!-capable server, making it ideal not only for backups but also for site transfers or even deploying sites to your clients' servers. Akeeba Backup creates a full backup of your site in a single archive. The archive contains all the files, a database snapshot and an installer similar in function to the standard Joomla! installer.
  • AcyMailing Starter. Improve your web communication on your Joomla website! Great all in one sollution for mailing in Joomla website. AcyMailing is a reliable Newsletter and email marketing extension for Joomla.
    It enables you to efficiently manage an unlimited number of subscribers, organize them into mailing lists, send personalized newsletters and more...
  • JCE editor - the best WYSiWYG editor for Joomla! An award-winning, configurable WYSIWYG editor for Joomla! based on Moxiecode's TinyMCE. Includes advanced Image, File and Link handling, plugin support, and an Administration interface for editor configuration.
  • Extra SEO SEF plugin - EFSEO - automatically generates description meta tags by pulling text from the content to help with SEO. It also gives you the ability to set different title configurations. EFSEO is a SEO extension for Joomla! with which you can control all important metadata manually and automatically. The handling of the metadata in Joomla! has never been so easy! With the plugin you may change and add meta information (title, description, keywords, generator and robots) easily in the frontend and with the component in the backend. It does not matter which component you use. The plugin is active on every page of a Joomla! website and may be used correspondingly.
    • - Integrate your Joomla website into the Open Graph Protocol. The Open Graph Protocol enables you to integrate your Web pages into the social graph. The structured data you provide via the Open Graph Protocol defines how your page will be represented on Facebook.
